translator
Class JavaStatic

java.lang.Object
  translator.JavaStatic

public class JavaStatic
extends java.lang.Object

Contains some instances of objects that are used all over the place and that make no sense to pass around.

Field Summary

          The pointer to the printer that prints to the implementation file.

static xtc.util.Runtime runtime

          The instance of Translator that everyone should use.
